SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into oper_log (orderId, incomeId, type, incomePrice, opName, opId, createTime, modifyTime) values (#{orderid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{incomeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{incomeprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{opname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update oper_log set orderId = #{orderid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, incomeId = #{incomeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, incomePrice = #{incomeprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, opName = #{opname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opId = #{opid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifyTime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, orderId, incomeId, type, incomePrice, opName, opId, createTime, modifyTime from oper_log
